name: Deathcap Myconid
description: The Deathcap Myconid is a Medium-sized plant creature with toxic power, exhibiting a resilience that makes it a dangerous foe. Its presence is marked by a slower movement speed of 20 feet, but its abilities to release toxic spores and deliver poisonous attacks make it formidable.
memorable: The ability to use poisonous spores and its hypersensitivity to sunlight make the Deathcap Myconid a unique and challenging adversary.
goals: To incapacitate or damage foes using toxic spores and melee attacks.
relations: Often found in areas with other myconids or hazardous plant creatures.
environment: Typically inhabits dark, damp environments where sunlight is minimal.
strengths: High hit points and damaging poison attacks are significant strengths.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to sunlight, suffering damage and reduced effectiveness when exposed.
attacks: Uses Spore-Coated Fist for bludgeoning and poison damage along with Eject Spores for debilitating effects.
most_powerful_ability: Eject Spores, which can cause debilitating effects on targets.
additional_information: Disadvantage on attack rolls in direct sunlight.
test_queries: myconid with bludgeoning and poison attacks
hazardous creature found in dark environments
